addressPage.countryNotAvailable: What if my country isn't listed?
changeAdmin.presentation.description: The account admin is the primary contact for all account operations, including transactions, updates, legal information, and account closure. This is a sensitive change that requires verification. Please provide accurate information to complete this change.
changeAdmin.presentation.expireNotice: This portal is accessible for <bold>48 hours</bold>. After that, contact customer support for a new link
changeAdmin.presentation.powerOfAttorney: You'll need a signed power of attorney if the new admin isn't the legal representative. Download our <link>power of attorney template</link> to speed up your request.
changeAdmin.presentation.title: Account admin change: {count} steps
changeAdmin.step.confirm.description:
Confirm the information below is correct. After you submit, we'll review your request.
If the new account admin doesn’t have account access yet, we'll send them an invitation to verify their identity and join. Once verified, we'll grant them the admin role. This may extend the processing time.
changeAdmin.step.confirm.title: Review and submit
changeAdmin.step.context1.description: These are the accounts to assign a new account admin. If the account information shown are incorrect, close this page and let us know.
changeAdmin.step.context1.title: About the holder and the accounts
changeAdmin.step.context2.areYouNewAdmin: Are you the new account admin?
changeAdmin.step.context2.description: We need a few details to verify the new admin.
changeAdmin.step.context2.title: Tell us about this change
changeAdmin.step.documents.description: Upload clear, complete documents in the formats specified below to support your request.
changeAdmin.step.documents.title: Add the required documents
changeAdmin.step.newAdminInfo.descriptio: Complete all fields with accurate information. We'll verify the new account admin's identity to process this request.
changeAdmin.step.newAdminInfo.isLegalRep: Is the new account admin the company's legal representative?
No, but I will provide Power of attorney
changeAdmin.step.newAdminInfo.title: Tell us about the new account admin
changeAdmin.step.requesterInfo.descripti: Complete all fields with accurate information. We'll use these details as the primary contact for this request.
changeAdmin.step.requesterInfo.title: Tell us about yourself
changeAdmin.success.description1:
We'll review your request within 48 hours.
We'll contact you if we need more information, otherwise we'll send an invitation directly to the new admin.
changeAdmin.success.title: Request successfully submitted
common.form.invalidLength: This field is limited to {maxLength} characters
company.document.supportingDocuments.pur: A document that provides evidence of the legal registration of a company or business entity with the relevant government authority. The document has to be less than 3 months old (excluding documents for Freiberufler and Gewerbetreibende).
company.step.basicInfo.description: We’ll start by collecting some basic information.
company.step.basicInfo.organisationTypeL: What type of organization is it?
company.step.basicInfo.powerOfAttorney: No, but I have power of attorney
company.step.basicInfo.title: Let’s open your account
company.step.documents.confirmModal.mess: If you choose not to provide them now, Swan will contact you for this information shortly. Your account won't be activated until all the supporting documents are received and verified.
company.step.documents.subtitle: Please provide high-quality, full-color files that capture the entire document.
company.step.documents.title: Supporting documents
company.step.organisation1.isRegisteredL: If you are, you’ll be asked for your {registrationNumberLegalName}
company.step.organisation1.title: Legal information
company.step.organisation2.descriptionLa: Description of your business, service, or product
company.step.organisation2.descriptionPl: Describe your business in few words...
company.step.organisation2.monthlyPaymen: Your company's expected monthly transaction volume for this account
company.step.organisation2.title: Company details
company.step.owners.additionalDescriptio: A UBO is any natural person who holds more than 25% of shares, controls more than 25% of voting rights, or who otherwise has significant control of the organization.
company.step.owners.beneficiary.birthCit: Search for the beneficiary's birth city
company.step.owners.beneficiary.birthPos: Enter the beneficiary's birth postal code
company.step.owners.beneficiary.directOr: You need to choose at least one of the options
company.step.owners.beneficiary.fillBirt: You need to fill the beneficiary's birth country first
company.step.owners.confirmModal.checkbo: I'll provide my organization's ownership (UBO) information later.
company.step.owners.confirmModal.descrip: If you choose not to provide information about your organization's ownership now, Swan will contact you for this information shortly. Your account won't be activated until all UBO information is received and verified.
company.step.owners.confirmModal.title: Ownership information is required
company.step.owners.deleteModal.title: Are you sure you want to delete {uboName}?
company.step.owners.description:
Add all of your organization's ultimate beneficial owners (UBO).
This information is required by law.
company.step.owners.title: Declare your organization's ownership
company.step.presentation.description: We will help you start registering your account. Follow a few steps that shouldn't take more then 5 minutes.
company.step.presentation.title: Thanks! Just {count} more steps ahead.
company.step.registration.countryLabel: What country do you live in?
company.step.registration.description: For regulatory reasons, we need some basic contact info.
company.step.registration.title: Who are you?
company.step.organisation.title: Open your account
company.step.organisation.subtitle: First, tell us about your organization.
company.step.organisation.relationLabel: What's your relationship to this organization?
companyType.selfEmployed.FRA: Self-employed, individual entrepreneur or liberal profession
error.birthdate.incomplete: Please enter your complete and valid birth date: month, day, and year.
error.checkConnection: Please check your internet connection and try again. If the error persists, contact us.
error.fixInvalidFields: Please check the form and try again. If the error persists, contact us.
error.onboarding.alreadyFinalized: This onboarding has already been completed
error.tryAgain: Please try again. If the error persists, contact us.
individual.step.activity.source: Where does your money come from?
individual.step.activity.usaCitizen: Are you a U.S. person for tax purposes?
individual.step.details.description: The law requires us to know our users well. This helps us prevent fraud and financial crime.
individual.step.details.title: What's your occupation?
individual.step.email.description: Please use the email of the person doing the onboarding. The one that will be contacted during the account opening process.
individual.step.email.label: What's your email?
individual.step.email.title: Who are you?
individual.step.finalize.content: We'll send a verification code to your phone to confirm your identity.
individual.step.finalize.title: Verify your phone number
individual.step.introduction.description: We will help you to initiate your account registration, just follow simple steps that won’t take more than 5 minutes.
individual.step.introduction.title: Just 4 more steps
individual.step.location.countryLabel: What country do you live in?
individual.step.location.title: What's your address?

step.finalize.description: Please get your phone to finalize the process.
step.finalize.terms: By clicking here, I accept {firstLink} and {secondLink}.
step.finalize.termsError: You have to accept the Terms and Conditions to continue
step.finalize.title: You're almost done.
step.finalizeError.description: Please add the missing information to finalize the process.

supportingDocumentCollection.merchant.in: We are reviewing your request to accept payments for your {accountHolderName} account. Please upload the following documents to complete this process.
supportingDocumentCollection.missingDocu: Some required supporting documents are missing

We require additional documents to complete your file.
supportingDocumentCollection.pendingRevi:
Please bear with us while we review them.
This usually takes a maximum of 72 hours.
supportingDocumentCollection.success.sub:
Your documents are in review.
You can close this window.

taxIdentificationNumber.germanInfo: Your Tax ID is required, but you can provide it later. Please provide it within 90 days. Otherwise, your account will be suspended.
